metadata.title: Boatrips
metadata.description: Werden Sie Teil der nächsten großen Sache in Pharma

about_us.welcome_to_boatrips_description:
We are genuinely delighted that you've chosen to explore the boundless possibilities we offer!



Our team is here to ensure that your visit to the enchanting shores of Lagos, Portugal, becomes an exceptional and unforgettable experience.



Our commitment to excellence and passion for the sea have been our guiding principles since our establishment. Your adventure begins with us, and we can't wait to share the beauty and excitement of Lagos with you. Let's embark on this exciting voyage together!
about_us.our_background_description:
Boatrips, a trusted name since the year 2000, has been creating unforgettable experiences in the picturesque coastal town of Lagos.



Located in the heart of this vibrant seaside destination, we pride ourselves on crafting unique adventures that have left a lasting impression on our guests.



Our commitment to excellence and our passion for the sea have been the cornerstones of our journey, and we can't wait to share the beauty and excitement of Lagos with you.
about_us.address_beginning: Look for a yellow stand with the name

features.description: Embark on an unforgettable journey with Boatrips and experience the natural beauty of Lagos like never before. Our boat tours offer a perfect blend of adventure, knowledge, and relaxation, ensuring you create lasting memories with every trip.

first_feature.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
first_feature.description: Enjoy peace of mind with our 100% satisfaction guarantee. Cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before your trip, and we'll provide a full refund.

second_feature.title: Experienced and Knowledgeable Guides
second_feature.description: Our guides are experts in local marine life. They'll enhance your tour with valuable insights into the region's natural wonders.

third_feature.title: Customizable Tour Options
third_feature.description: Tailor your adventure with our customizable tour options. Whether it's a private tour or specific requests, we've got you covered.

fourth_feature.title: Safety First Approach
fourth_feature.description: Your safety is our priority. Our crew and vessels are dedicated to ensuring a secure journey so you can relax and enjoy your adventure.

fifth_feature.title: Animal Friendly
fifth_feature.description: We welcome your pets onboard. Contact us in advance to arrange your furry companion's spot on the trip.

expiriences.title: OUR EXPIRIENCES
expiriences.description: Welcome aboard! Dive into a world of endless possibilities as you explore our extensive array of captivating boat tours below, promising unforgettable experiences along the stunning coast of Lagos.
expiriences.blockquote:
At Boatrips, we're not just in the business of boat tours. We're in the business of creating unforgettable memories. We put our heart and soul into every voyage, ensuring that each one is a unique and thrilling adventure.



We meticulously plan routes, curate exciting activities, and pay attention to every detail to make your experience exceptional. Our goal is to enchant every person who joins us on board with the beauty of the sea. We believe that every journey with us is a testament to the magic of exploration, a chance to create cherished memories.



From sunrise to sunset, under clear blue skies or a starry night, every tour we offer is a fresh chapter in the book of your adventures. We invite you to set sail with us and discover the hidden gems of the stunning coast of Lagos. With us, every tour is a new story waiting to be written.

questions.specific_questions: Do you have any specific question?
questions.fill_form_text: Please fill the form below and our dedicated team will get intouch with you as soon as possible

first_question.title: What should I bring on a boat trip?
first_question.content: You should bring essentials like sunscreen, a hat, sunglasses, a swimsuit, a towel, a reusable water bottle, and any personal medications. Don't forget your identification, such as a driver's license or passport, and cash for expenses.

second_question.title: How can I prevent seasickness?
second_question.content: To prevent seasickness, consider taking over-the-counter motion sickness medication or using acupressure wristbands. Avoid heavy meals before the trip, stay hydrated, and focus on the horizon. If you're prone to seasickness, consult a doctor for prescription medication or patches.

third_question.title: What's the best time for a boat trip?
third_question.content: The best time for a boat trip depends on your destination and preferences. In general, summer and early fall offer pleasant weather for boat outings. However, it's essential to check local weather conditions and seasonal variations for your specific location.

fourth_question.title: Are life jackets provided on the boat?
fourth_question.content: Most responsible boat operators provide life jackets or personal flotation devices (PFDs) for passengers. It's a safety requirement. Ensure that you wear your life jacket properly when instructed or when you feel it's necessary for your safety.

fifth_question.title: What happens in case of bad weather during the trip?
fifth_question.content: In case of bad weather, boat captains prioritize passenger safety. They may choose to delay the trip, alter the route, or even cancel it if conditions are unsafe. It's important to follow the captain's instructions and be prepared for possible schedule changes.

ponta_da_piedade.title: Ponta da Piedade
ponta_da_piedade.description: Sail the seas of the Algarve in true Portuguese style on a boat cruise in a traditional Portuguese boat. Visit to the rugged sea caves and get up close to the dramatic Ponta da Piedade rock formation. Learn more about the area from your local skipper. For an unforgettable experience, you will board your unique vessel complete with a traditional Portuguese design. These special boats are designed to get you to sail to the smallest grotto.

coastline_tour.title: Coastline tour
coastline_tour.description: Explore the caves and rock formations of Ponta da Piedade on a cruise trip from Lagos. Visit the tiny grottoes with your guide on a smaller boat for ease of navigation. Swim or snorkel in the water with the gear provided. After boarding the 'Mananita', a traditional Portuguese boat, admire the breathtaking views of the coast of Lagos. Visit a rock formation that dates back thousands of years, and marvel at the rock details that have been sculptured throughout time by waves and marine life.

benagil_cave.title: Benagil cave
benagil_cave.description: Hop onboard one of our specifically designed speed boats for a unique adventure to Benagil. Despite the distance of 12 nautical miles from Lagos to the coast of Carvoeiro and Benagil. Enter the various caves in the area that are not accessible from larger vessels. Listen as the guide tells stories about the Algarve region along the way. Visit amazing caves and hidden grottos from the inside, and see natural wonders that can't be reached in any other way.

sunset_cruise.title: Sunset cruise
sunset_cruise.description: Discover one of the most beautiful spots on the coast of the Algarve on a romantic boat cruise to Ponta da Piedade. Climb aboard at Lagos Harbor and set sail to see amazing rock formations, sea caves and golden beaches from the water. Drop anchor at the idyllic rock formations of Ponta da Piedade, and marvel at the contrast between the brown-red rocks and the green-blues waters of the Atlantic Ocean. At your request, stop for a swim break. Complete your evening in paradise as you watch the sun set over the horizon.

private_ponta_da_piedade.title: Private Ponta da Piedade
private_ponta_da_piedade.description: Sail the seas of the Algarve in true Portuguese style on a boat cruise in a traditional Portuguese boat. Visit the rugged sea caves and get up close to the dramatic Ponta da Piedade rock formation. Learn more about the area from your local skipper. For an unforgettable experience, you will board your unique vessel complete with a traditional Portuguese design. These special boats are designed to get you to sail to the smallest grotto. Located around the rock formation of Ponta da Piedade, get an amazing perspective of famous beaches such as Dona Ana Beach, Camila Beach, and Nudist Beach, as well as sandstone cliffs. At your request, stop for a swim break.

private_sunset_cruise.title: Private Sunset cruise
private_sunset_cruise.description: Discover one of the most beautiful spots on the coast of the Algarve on a romantic boat cruise to Ponta da Piedade. Visit the rugged sea caves and get up close to the rock formation. Learn more about the area from your local skipper. Get an amazing perspective of famous beaches such as Dona Ana Beach, Camilo Beach, and Nudist Beach, as well as sandstone cliffs. At your request, stop for a swim break. Every journey will be different and a true adventure depending on the tides and sea conditions. This is a must-do trip and is enjoyable for the whole family. Complete your evening in paradise as you watch the sun set over the horizon.

ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.tour_description:
Sail the seas of the Algarve in true Portuguese style on a boat cruise in a traditional Portuguese boat. Visit to the rugged sea caves and get up close to the dramatic Ponta da Piedade rock formation. Learn more about the area from your local skipper. For an unforgettable experience, you will board your unique vessel complete with a traditional Portuguese design. These special boats are designed to get you to sail to the smallest grotto.



This boat will take you on a memorable journey along the breathtaking coastline, entering two amazing caves briefly and revealing the hidden grottos from the inside. Located around the rock formation of Ponta da Piedade, get an amazing perspective of famous beaches such as Dona Ana Beach, Camila Beach, and Nudist Beach, as well as sandstone cliffs.



Every journey will be different and a true adventure depending on the tides and sea conditions. This is a must-do trip and is enjoyable for the whole family.
ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.first_highlight: Enjoy the beautiful scenery along the way
ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.second_highlight: See the amazing beaches surrounding Lagos and discover the historic and cultural part of the Algarve
ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.third_highlight: Learn from your local, expert skippers
ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.fourth_highlight: Marvel at the spectacular rock formations and caves

ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.second_reminder: We recommend bringing sunscreen, swimming gear, a hat and a towel;
ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.third_reminder: Please check-in 20 minutes before the start of the experience;
ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.fourth_reminder: This experience does not include food and drinks so feel free to bring your own;

ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.second_perk: A local captain will give you onboard commentary about the sights;
ponta-da-piedade-caves-cruise.third_perk: See the amazing beaches surrounding Lagos

ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.title: Ponta da Piedade Cave and Coastal
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.ponta_da_piedade: Ponta da Piedade Cave and Coastal Tour
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.tour_description:
Explore the caves and rock formations of Ponta da Piedade on a cruise trip from Lagos. Visit the tiny grottoes with your guide on a smaller boat for ease of navigation. Swim or snorkel in the water with the gear provided.



After boarding the 'Mananita', a traditional Portuguese boat, admire the breathtaking views of the coast of Lagos. Visit a rock formation that dates back thousands of years, and marvel at the rock details that have been sculptured throughout time by waves and marine life.



Relax while the skipper navigates the crystal waters close to the coastline. After dropping anchor, hop onto a smaller boat to view the caves and wildlife up close. If you're feeling adventurous, go for a swim or explore the outstanding marine life with a snorkel.
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.first_highlight: Have fun on the round trip cruise between Lagos and Praia da Porto de Mos
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.third_highlight: Learn from your local, expert skippers
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.fourth_highlight: Admire the views of the caves and rock formations of Ponta da Piedade and the Algarve coast
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.first_reminder: This experience does not include food and drinks so feel free to bring your own;
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.second_reminder: We recommend bringing sunscreen, swimming gear, a hat and a towel;
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.third_reminder: Please check-in 20 minutes before the start of the experience;
ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.fourth_reminder: This activity can be canceled due to bad weather or sea conditions, if this happens a refund will be issued or a different day will be issued;

ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.third_perk: See the amazing beaches surrounding Lagos

ponta-da-piedade-2-hours-cruise.third_info: We advise our customers to bring their hat or cap, sunglasses and sunscreen.

benagil-caves.tour_description:
Hop onboard one of our specifically designed speed boats for a unique adventure to Benagil. Despite the distance of 12 nautical miles from Lagos to the coast of Carvoeiro and Benagil.



Enter the various caves in the area that are not accessible from larger vessels. Listen as the guide tells stories about the Algarve region along the way. Visit amazing caves and hidden grottos from the inside, and see natural wonders that can't be reached in any other way.



Keep a lookout, as dolphins can often be seen navigating the waters here, and if they are spotted and are less than 3 miles away, the boat will head in their direction so you can get a closer look at these playful animals.
benagil-caves.first_highlight: Discover some of the most beautiful sea caves on the Algarve Coast
benagil-caves.second_highlight: Access unique natural sea caves that can only be reached by boat
benagil-caves.third_highlight: Learn the area's natural history from the live tour guide onboard
benagil-caves.fourth_highlight: Look out for the local dolphins playing around in the clear water
benagil-caves.first_reminder: This experience does not include food and drinks
benagil-caves.third_reminder: Please check-in 20 minutes before the start of the experience;
benagil-caves.fourth_reminder: This activity can be canceled due to bad weather or sea conditions, if this happens a refund will be issued or a different day will be issued;
benagil-caves.first_perk: A safety briefing by a multilingual guide, insurance and life-jackets are included;
benagil-caves.second_perk: A local captain will give you onboard commentary about the sights;
benagil-caves.third_perk: In the event of windy conditions, a wind jacket will be provided
benagil-caves.first_info: For cancellations of customers with more than 24 hours before departure, we refund the amount in full.
benagil-caves.second_info: Children must be accompanied by an adult
benagil-caves.third_info: By Law it, is not allowed to go off the boat inside of the Benagil Cave or any other cave
benagil-caves.fourth_info: Boatrips is not responsible for lost or damaged personal items on board.

Drop anchor at the idyllic rock formations of Ponta da Piedade, and marvel at the contrast between the brown-red rocks and the green-blues waters of the Atlantic Ocean.



At your request, stop for a swim break. Complete your evening in paradise as you watch the sun set over the horizon.

sunset-cruise.third_highlight: Stop at Ponta da Piedade to swim
